title: fix expectation for densities
body:
*Description of changes:*
Current version shows the following:

$E[X] = \int x \;dp(x)$

Updated to:

$E[X] = \int x p(x)\;dx$

By submitting this pull request, I confirm that you can use, modify,
copy, and redistribute this contribution, under the terms of your
choice.

title: Define logit
body: I don't think logits are ever formally defined anywhere in the book, they're just suddenly mentioned in 4.1 Softmax Regression.
